Title: Thieving Gorlocs
Description:
Is Farrier Roscha invited to the caravan? No! But who must provide shoes for the caravan? Farrier Roscha. And from whom do the Mudfins steal? Of course, Farrier Roscha. Pah.

I would send Khasar, but who knows where he has wandered this time? 

Find my supplies. Teach those thieving creatures not to steal from Farrier Roscha.

Go!
ObjectivesText: Return the stolen supplies from the Mudfin Village.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Khasar in the Mudfin Village
RewardText:
Roscha sent you? She must be furious.

She has been through so much already. I could not return without securing all that was lost.
